text: Immanuel Jarod McElroy (born March 25, 1980) is an American professional basketball player. He is a point guard-shooting guard and small forward. ==College career== McElroy played college basketball at Tyler Junior College from 1998-00 and at the University of Cincinnati from 2000 to 2002.Immanuel McElroy College Profile @ ESPN.com ==Professional career== In his professional career, McElroy has played with: the Grand Rapids Hoops, Dodge City Legend, Gary Steelheads, RheinEnergie Cologne, ALBA Berlin. While playing for ALBA Berlin McElroy won the Best Defensive Player award of the German League 5 times in a row, from 2007 till 2011. In July 2011 he signed a two-year contract with New Yorker Phantoms, later the Löwen Braunschweig.New Yorker tab Immanuel McElroy ==References== ==External links== *Euroleague.net Profile *Eurobasket.com Profile *ALBA Berlin Profile Category:1980 births Category:Living people Category:Alba Berlin players Category:American expatriate basketball people in Germany Category:Basketball Löwen Braunschweig players Category:Basketball players from Texas Category:Cincinnati Bearcats men's basketball players Category:Grand Rapids Hoops players Category:Köln 99ers players Category:Point guards Category:Science City Jena players Category:Shooting guards Category:Sportspeople from Galveston, Texas Category:Tyler Apaches men's basketball players Category:American men's basketball players Category:United States Basketball League players
title: Immanuel McElroy
